text:
Data Management Inc. | PHP Developer | Greensboro, NC | Full Time, Onsite, https://www.data-management.com

We're a nonprofit technology company specializing in CRM and data processing. We have more than fifty years of experience in our industry, and we're committed to strengthening our reputation as an innovator. We need seriously talented developers with diverse experience, and we're willing to help with relocation expenses. You can check out our careers page via the main site's footer.
